data.actual_result: They turn grey until changing channel/server.
data.expected_result: The buttons should keep their color.
data.short_description: [Mac specific] Minimize, close and full screen button turn grey when closing a full screen video
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a link to a youtube video or upload a video directly - Open this video in full screen - Close full screen - Observe the close, minimize and full screen button
